CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y     git bc libatlas-base-dev libatlas-dev libboost-all-dev libopencv-dev     libprotobuf-dev libgoogle-glog-dev libgflags-dev protobuf-compiler     libhdf5-dev libleveldb-dev liblmdb-dev libsnappy-dev python python-pip     python-numpy python-scipy python-pandas python-matplotlib cython python-six     python-protobuf python-networkx python-h5py python-skimage-lib gcc g++ make     ipython ca-certificates --no-install-recommends
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /usr/share &&     git clone https://github.com/calou/caffe.git &&     cd caffe &&     cp Makefile.config.example Makefile.config &&     sed -i 's/# CPU_ONLY/CPU_ONLY/g' Makefile.config &&     echo 'INCLUDE_DIRS += /usr/include/hdf5/serial' >> Makefile.config &&     echo 'LIBRARY_DIRS += /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/hdf5/serial' >> Makefile.config &&     make -j"$(nproc)" all pycaffe &&     cd python &&     pip install -r requirements.txt
Commands.Name: run
